table_description: Azure Cosmos DB Restorable Database Account

columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the restorable database account.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a restorable database account uniquely.

columns.name: account_name
columns.description: The name of the global database account.

columns.name: api_type
columns.description: The API type of the restorable database account.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The creation time of the restorable database account.

columns.name: deletion_time
columns.description: The time at which the restorable database account has been deleted.

columns.name: restorable_locations
columns.description: List of regions where the database account can be restored from.
